<onlyinclude>
'''1.21.10 Release Candidate 1''' (known as '''1.21.10-rc1''' in the [[launcher]]) is the first and only release candidate for [[Java Edition 1.21.10]], released on October 2, 2025.<ref>{{Mcnet|minecraft-1-21-10-release-candidate-1|Minecraft 1.21.10 Release Candidate 1|October 2, 2025}}</ref>

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|project=MC|fixedin=1.21.10 Release Candidate 1
|;From released versions before 1.21
|211096|Entities in cobwebs clip through pistons.
|278182|Items glitch inside the piston head when pushed through powder snow or cobwebs.
|;From 1.21.9
|301916|The behavior of wind charges when colliding with certain blocks is different.
|302321|Chunks do not load while the player is being teleported.
|302383|Rooms with carpet on the floor cannot have maps in item frames placed on walls touching the floor.
|302405|Repeating (or chain) command block with any form of {{cmd|/tp [player]}} doesn't constantly tp player to one spot.
|otherissuescount=1
}}
* Fixed an issue that caused entities on bubble columns to fly high up into the air.</onlyinclude>

== Trivia ==
* This version has the same protocol version number as [[25w42a]]. The two versions are not actually compatible; 1.21.10-rc1 throws a "Network Protocol Error" message when attempting to join a 25w42a world, and 25w42a crashes when attempting to join a 1.21.10-rc1 world.
